channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Anduril Is Building Out the Pentagon’s Dream of Deadly Drone Swarms
item.description: The US military aims to maintain its dominance by building autonomous attack drones that collaborate with humans and overwhelm defenses in swarms.

item.title: More neobanks are becoming mobile networks — and Nubank wants a piece of the action
item.description: Nubank is taking its first tentative steps into the mobile network realm, as the NYSE-traded Brazilian neobank rolls out an eSIM (embedded SIM) servic...

item.title: Cops Are Just Trolling Cybercriminals Now
item.description: Police are using subtle psychological operations against ransomware gangs to sow distrust in their ranks—and trick them into emerging from the shadows...

item.title: MARS doubles down on India’s Infra.Market with new $50M investment
item.description: Infra.Market, an Indian startup that helps construction and real estate firms procure materials, has raised $50M from MARS Unicorn Fund. © 2024 TechCr...

item.title: 35 Best Memorial Day Sales (2024): TVs, Office Chairs, and Ebikes
item.description: Not all discounts—or gadgets—are equal. We’ve rounded up the best deals on WIRED-tested gear.

item.title: Cloover wants to speed solar adoption by helping installers finance new sales
item.description: Small operations can lose customers by not offering financing, something the Berlin-based startup wants to change. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reser...

item.title: 28 Best Memorial Day Mattress Deals (2024)
item.description: Sleep starting to feel less like a luxury? It might be time for a new mattress or bed sheet. Good thing plenty are on sale.

item.title: Adani looks to battle Reliance, Walmart in India’s e-commerce, payments race, report says
item.description: India's Adani Group is in discussions to venture into digital payments and e-commerce, according to a report. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. ...

item.title: 33 Best REI Anniversary Sale Deals (2024): Fitness Trackers, Tents, Sleeping Bags, Headphones, Electric Bikes
item.description: It’s the best time of the year to pick up all the tents, stoves, sleeping bags, and gear you’ll need for summer fun. Just remember these deals end ton...

item.title: Ledger starts shipping its high-end hardware crypto wallet
item.description: Ledger, a French startup mostly known for its secure crypto hardware wallets, has started shipping new wallets nearly 18 months after announcing the l...
